Azimuth Unknown

Coming in 2024 / 2025

A large-scale ‘destination’ larp set in the ‘Expanded Reverie Universe’ about the near future and conflict mixing with the horrors of the unknown. This larp will take place at a survival training/military simulation facility which outfits vehicles, barracks, admin buildings, ruined cityscapes, and military gear for multi-day events.
